# a = bottle 1, b = bottle 2, c = bottle 3
a, b, c = map(int, input().split())

if b + c > a:
    print(b + c - a)
else:
    print(0)


a, b, c = map(int, input().split())

print(c - (a - b))


a, b, c = map(int, input().split()) # input a, b, c

print(c - (a - b))

print(c - (a - b))
